definitions: Present participle of ride, meaning to sit on and control the movement of an animal, vehicle, or bicycle.
Present participle of ride, meaning to travel in a vehicle, especially as a passenger.
Present participle of ride, meaning to be carried or supported by something.
examples: She's ridin' her bike to work.
They were ridin' in the back of the truck.
The boat was ridin' high on the waves.
